ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] HS Key
ygData.msgSnippet: I used bard invis.  Key thing is to put it in trade window and wait for the song to re-pulse and check your con before hitting trade - make sure you are back
ygData.messageBody:
I used bard invis. Key thing is to put it in trade window and wait for the
song to re-pulse and check your con before hitting trade - make sure you are
back to indiff before you trade. Now, that happened a long time ago - they
may have made changes to invis while questing. But you should be able to
invis to get behind him and away from the other agro froogs in the room.
Then get a successful sneak going - which you can do while invis. Then hand
item, check con and trade if and only if con is indiff or better. Not sure
what faction song would do for you (ie: is he threatening or scowling to
start with?).

Sylly Songsynger
The Pantheon
Troubador, somewhere on Innoruuk...



-----Original Message-----
From: Matt DeBarger [mailto:mattdeba@...]
Sent: Tuesday, April 03, 2001 8:35 AM
To: eqbards@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [eqbards] HS Key


I finally got my xalgoz fang (4th attempt). For turning them into the necro
frog, most people have told me to use wolf form. However this would require
me dragging some friendly druid out of his way...

SO is it possible to use sneak or charm?
